Class MotePacketSerialParser

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--MotePacketParser
        |
        +--MotePacketSerialParser
public class MotePacketSerialParser
extends MotePacketParser

A MotePacketSerialParser extends MotePacketParser to open a serial port, receive mote bytes from that port, and process bytes until EOF.

Constructor Summary

          Construct with the given serial port name.

          Open the serial port.
